Package task7

Class OneDimBoundedArray<T>

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<T>
task7.OneDimBoundedArray<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements stored in the array.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<T>, Collection<T>, List<T>
public class OneDimBoundedArray<T> extends AbstractList<T>
The OneDimBoundedArray is a class that represents a one-dimensional bounded array. It extends AbstractList to provide a limited range of indexes for array elements.
